001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FlowAssembler;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009/**
010 * Flow assembler for TN3270 that forwards non-empty payloads without reordering.
011 *
012 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
013 */
014public final class Tn3270FlowAssemblerAdapter implements FlowAssembler {
015  private final MetricsPort metrics;
016
017  /**
018   * Creates a TN3270 flow assembler adapter.
019   *
020   * @param metrics metrics sink used for flow assembler counters
021   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code metrics} is {@code null}
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  public Tn3270FlowAssemblerAdapter(MetricsPort metrics) {
025    this.metrics = metrics;
026  }
027
028  /**
029   * Emits a {@link ByteStream} for each non-empty TN3270 payload.
030   *
031   * @param segment TCP segment to evaluate; may be {@code null}
032   * @return byte stream when payload is non-empty; otherwise empty
033   * @implNote Emits one {@link ByteStream} per segment without attempting reordering.
034   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
035   */
036  @Override
037  public Optional<ByteStream> accept(TcpSegment segment) {
038    if (segment == null) {
039      metrics.increment("tn3270.flowAssembler.nullSegment");
040      return Optional.empty();
041    }
042
043    byte[] payload = segment.payload();
044    if (payload.length == 0) {
045      metrics.increment("tn3270.flowAssembler.emptyPayload");
046      return Optional.empty();
047    }
048
049    metrics.increment("tn3270.flowAssembler.payload");
050    metrics.observe("tn3270.flowAssembler.bytes", payload.length);
051    ByteStream slice =
052        new ByteStream(
053            segment.flow(),
054            segment.fromClient(),
055            payload,
056            segment.timestampMicros());
057    return Optional.of(slice);
058  }
059}
